name: Pixel Hero Rope'N'Fly - Flappy Game
description:
Wanna play hard?! Pixel Hero Rope'N'Fly - new arcade game by Level1Games is for you! Be the best and fly the longest distance with your Hero Pixel Hero Rope'N'Fly avoiding coming obstacles.

[CONTROLS]
1. Hold your finger to go up.
2. Release your finger to go down.

One touch control
One Hero
One goal

Pixel Hero Rope'N'Fly might be the hardest game you have ever played. Prove that your skills are made from hero house ! :)) Be the best!

What we can take the criticism! :))
